title: fsr-c12001-05
text: ADMISSIONS REPLY FORM Please check (and complete where necessary) one or more of the following statements, which will convey to us your intent. Please submit your intend by sending an e-mail to “studentinfo@sabanciuniv.edu” Acceptance of Admission Yes, I intend to register at Sabancı University in ………….semester of …………..academic year. If the address you have provided on the application form is changed, please provide your new mailing address and telephone number by sending an e-mail to ”studentinfo@sabanciuniv.edu”. I’ve received the following financial award from a source other than Sabancı University and will have it as support at Sabancı University: Institution Financial Aid Offer Duration Declination of Admission I do not plan to attend any graduate school at this time because of the following reason: Financial Employment Personal/Health Other (Please state:……………………………………..….) I will be attending to another university ……………………………………………………………….……………………………. Name of the University / College Please state your reasons starting with “1” for the primary reason: __ Superior career opportunity __ Financial scholarship covering……………………….……… __ Research opportunity __ Location of campus __ Personal or family reasons __ Offer of admission from Sabancı University received too late __ Housing __ Other, please specify:……………………………………. Name, Surname : ……………………………………. Date : ………………………… FSR-C12001-05
